sense.def:
A word
je enota zapisanega ali govorjenega jezika. V pisni angleščini je pred tako enoto in za njo presledek. Nekatere imajo več pomenov.

To have a word
ali
to have a few words with someone
pomeni imeti kratek pogovor z nekom;

seg.quote: May I have a word with you please?

sense.def:
A word of advice or warning
je kratek nasvet ali svarilo.

Kadar ne slišimo, ne razumemo ali ne verjamemo
a word of what someone is saying
, ne slišimo, ne razumemo ali ne verjamemo prav nič.

seg.quote: I did not understand one word of what she'd said.

sense.def:
Izraz
word
lahko uporabimo v enakem pomenu kot
news
.

seg.quote: The young man brought them word of her visit.
The word got out that he was leaving.

sense.def:
To give one's word
pomeni obljubiti, da bomo nekaj storili.

seg.quote: I give you my word I won't ask him.
I apologized for having doubted his word.

sense.def:
To word something in a particular way
pomeni nekaj izraziti na določen način.

seg.quote: How would one word such an announcement?
He wrote a strongly worded report to the Secretary of the Interior.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj ponovimo
word for word
, ponovimo natanko tako, kot je bilo prvotno rečeno ali zapisano.

To have the last word in an argument
pomeni dati pripombo, s katero končamo pogovor in premagamo sogovornika.

To put in a good word for someone
pomeni vplivni osebi pohvalno govoriti o nekom.

Z izrazom
in a word
povemo, da povzemamo tisto, kar smo pravkar povedali.

seg.quote: The house is roomy, cool in summer, and in a word comfortable.

sense.def:
To have words with someone
pomeni prepirati se z nekom.

Izraz
in other words
uporabimo, ko napovemo preprostejšo ali jasnejšo razlago tistega, kar smo pravkar slišali.

cit.quote: z drugimi besedami, ali drugače povedano

seg.quote: Is there a cheaper solution? In other words, can you make a cheaper device?

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj povemo
in our own words
, povemo na svoj način, ne da bi posnemali ali ponavljali tisto, kar je rekel nekdo drug.

seg.quote: He was asked to tell the story in his own words.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da nekdo nečesa ni povedal
in so many words
, hočemo reči, da je tisto povedal posredno, mi pa zdaj razlagamo pravi pomen izrečenega.

seg.quote: This is what he claims, only he does not state it in so many words.
